item.title: BZOJ 1636: [Usaco2007 Jan]Balanced Lineup (RMQ模板题)
item.description: 1636: [Usaco2007 Jan]Balanced Lineup Time Limit: 5 Sec Memory Limit: 64 MB Submit: 680 Solved: 493 [Submit][Status][Discuss] Description For the daily milking, Farmer John’s N cows (1 <= N <= 50,000) always line up in the same order. One day Farmer John decides to organize a game of Ultimate Frisbee with some of the cows. To keep things simple, he will take a contiguous range of cows from the milking
